# CPAS_trend

<!-- badges: start -->
<!-- badges: end -->

This repository contains a shiny app to present results from the CPAS longitudinal research project. 

The shiny app allows a user to explore the modeled trajectories of Australians during the COVID-19 pandemic in 2020 based on a number of predictors.
